keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Deutsche Bank from July 1, 2018, to July 31, 2018.
The account had a beginning balance of $2,080,509.86 and an ending balance of $558,833.88.
Significant transactions included outgoing transfers totaling $1,523,000.00.
Interest payments of $1,324.02 were credited to the account during this period.
There were no service charges or fees reported for the calendar year.
